author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-2374: Added Attribute reflection API: It's now possible to inspect the contents of AttributeImpl and AttributeSource using a well-defined API

author: jukka
msg: TIKA-567: Temporary file leak in TikaInputStream

author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-2874: Highlighting overlapping tokens outputs doubled words

author: rmatthews
msg: Guard to prevent warnings from being repeated went on to allow rest of method to run causing an NPE.  Guard now allows returns, but only logs once.
